stepTitle: Suppose four point masses are placed on a number line as follows: $$m_1=12kg$$, placed at $$x_1=-4m$$, $$m_2=12kg$$, placed at $$x_2=4m$$, $$m_3=30kg$$, placed at $$x_3=2m$$, and $$m_4=6kg$$, placed at $$x_4=-6m$$. Find the moment of the system with respect to the origin and find the center of mass of the system.
